topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Configuring the ESX Components in a Sacramento Deployment

body.p: After the HP DCN components are configured, the next task in installing the Sacramento deployment is to configure the ESX components.

section.title: Set up the environment for ESX
section.p: ESX should be deployed before starting the cloud deployment. For more information, refer to the VMware product documentation.

ul.li: ESX Cluster is installed and functional with external storage connected to all the hosts that are part of ESX cluster
ESX Cluster with two (2) or more hosts installed with ESXi 5.5 U2 and above
ESX Cluster should have HA, DRS & Vmotion Enabled
ESX Cluster should have Shared Storage
vCenter is working with the supported versions. One vCenter is supported.
The CLM and TUL networks must be available to all ESX hosts VMNICs

section.title: Deploy the VMware vSphere Distributed Switch
section.p: The VMware vSphere Distributed Switch you obtained from VMware must be installed. For more information, see Deploying the VMware vSphere Distributed Switch.
